data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Timm, Tarmo, Arslan, Naime, Rüzgar, Melih, Martinsson, Svante, Erséus, Christer (2013): Oligochaeta (Annelida) of the profundal of Lake Hazar (Turkey), with description of Potamothrix alatus hazaricus n. ssp. Zootaxa 3716 (2): 144-156, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3716.2.2
